thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Gaétan Paquin
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Gaétan Paquin

author: Gaétan Paquin
title: Gaétan Paquin
text:
Hi, i gave 5 stars because i order at Banggood for a couple of year now and yes of course it happend sometime that i wasn't satisfied with some items. It happend in every store in my country. But most of the time everything is fine. I give 6 stars to the services because when you contact them they are as fast as lightning to answer and correct your problem. Special Thanks to Giselle, you have made my daughter very happy when she learned that she will receive a new working USB key by air parcel register.
Gaetan Paquin
